meeting_info.organization: City of Dallas Public Facility Corporation
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Auditorium L1FN and Videoconference, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, TX 75201

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the minutes of March 26, 2024 Board Meeting

agenda_items.title: Amended Resolution for The Park at Northpoint Apartments
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of an amended resolution inducing The Park at Northpoint Apartments in partnership with an affiliate of LDG - The Park at Northpoint LP to be located at approximately 9999 Technology Boulevard West, Dallas Texas; and authorizing the negotiation and execution of a term sheet; and other matters in connection therewith
agenda_items.presenter: Albert Gonzalez, Jim Plummer, Tim Nelson

agenda_items.title: Appointment of Board Members
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution authorizing the appointment of One Dallas Public Facility Corporation Board member to the Dallas Public Facility Corporation Governance Committee and the appointment of Three Dallas Public Facility Corporation Board members to the Dallas Public Facility Corporation Community Outreach Committee

agenda_items.title: Dallas Housing Policy 2033 Equity Strategy Target Areas
agenda_items.description: Presentation and discussion of Dallas Housing Policy 2033 Equity Strategy Target Areas

agenda_items.title: Community Reinvestment Review
agenda_items.description: Discussion and review of Dallas Public Facility Corporation’s community reinvestment

agenda_items.title: Governance Committee Progress Report
agenda_items.description: Discussion and review of Dallas PFC Governance Committee Progress Report

agenda_items.title: Treasurer’s Report
agenda_items.description: Discussion and review of Dallas PFC Treasurer’s Report

agenda_items.title: Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Discussion and review of Dallas PFC Pipeline Report
